CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1957, pg. 14 reads: "Glamour...Glamour...was in evidence during the tournament play and here are four examples...Right: Petite Jean Pratt of Dee Cee chose short-shorts for the torrid play at the Fort Pitt Hotel."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Jean Pratt posed in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
